resources.string: Access to the tools plugin
Members of this role have access to the Tools plugin
Tools recognized the following plugins:\n\n
These settings allow you to enable or disable subplugins. (Default: all subplugins enabled)

Tools is a platform for smaller Admidio plugins (sub-plugins).\n\nAll sub-plugins must be in subfolders of tools and have the same name as the subfolder. Example: .../Tools/user_info/user_info.php. By default, a button is generated for each detected sub-plugin, which can be used to start it.

During installation, a menu item and an access role are automatically created for the main script Tools.

However, a separate menu entry can also be created for each sub-plugin.

If, for example, you only need the sub-plugin USER_INFO from the tools collection, the following URL entry is required in the menu:

/adm_plugins/Tools/user_info/user_info.php
It is strongly recommended to specify a role for each menu item under "Visible for". Both tools and the sub-plugins create an access permission from the specified roles.
